name: Halong Bay-on-land & Cuc Phuong National Park - V10
description: This two-day trip from Hanoi takes you to discover the outstanding natural beauty of Tam Coc and the rich biodiversity of Cuc Phuong National Park – the two splendors of Ninh Binh province introducing you to two different interesting worlds. If a boat trip to Tam Coc which is often referred to as “Halong Bay on Land” opens up a boundless world of dramatic and mesmerizing landscape drawn by a waterway unwinding along extensive rice fields and spectacular limestone mountains, a visit to Cuc Phuong National Park leads you deep into a world of thousands of animals and plants living side by side.  All are ensured to enlighten and inspire you!
